text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly addresses the Principal Purpose Test (PPT) under MLI Art. 7, stating that if one of the principal purposes of the arrangement was to obtain the treaty benefit (0% WHT), the benefit is denied.
